resources.string: Steps: How much count is increased each time.
Reset: To reset the counter and steps to default value.
You have not saved anything yet

◆ Steps: How much count is increased each time. 

◆ Count: Tap it to count 

◆ Save icon: If you wish to save your current count press the save icon and name it. 

◆ List: When you save anything it will be showed in the list, tap on it if you wish to continue that count. Tap on cross "X" to delete it.
